text: phra xngkh̒ khụ̄x xạllxḥˌ sụ̀ng mị̀mī phracêā xụ̄̀n dı xīk nxkcāk phraxngkh̒ p̄hū̂thrng xảnāc s̄ūngs̄ud p̄hū̂thrng bris̄uthṭhi̒ p̄hū̂thrng khwām ṣ̄ānti s̄uk̄h p̄hū̂thrng khûmkhrxng kār ṣ̄rạthṭhā p̄hū̂thrng pkpạkrạks̄ʹā khwām plxdp̣hạy p̄hū̂thrng khwām yìng h̄ıỵ̀ p̣hūmicı mh̄ā bris̄uthṭhi̒ dæ̀ xạllxḥˌ h̄ı̂ pĥn cāk s̄ìng thī̀ phwk k̄heā tậng p̣hākhī t̀x phraxngkh̒
